description: Try our easy to follow Spaghetti and Meatballs recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pasta with meatballs,Quick & easy dinner,High fibre,High protein,Tree nut free,Mince,Low sugar,Beef
name: Spaghetti and Meatballs Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare spaghetti according to pack instructions.

Make meatballs by combining mince, onion, carrot, breadcrumbs and egg in a bowl. Season with salt and pepper and mix well. Using clean hands, roll heaped tablespoonfuls of mixture into balls and place on a prepared tray.
Heat oil in a non-stick frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook meatballs, in batches, for 2 minutes or until browned. Transfer to a plate.
Wipe pan clean with paper towel, add browed meatballs and ready-made bolognese sauce and heat through over a medium heat for 5 minutes.
Serve cooked sauce with cooked spaghetti.
